Class GreenHouseServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • uk.org.openseizuredetector.greenhouse.GreenHouseServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2

    public class GreenHouseServer
extends android.app.Service
    Based on example at: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/14309256/using-nanohttpd-in-android and http://developer.android.com/guide/components/services.html#ExtendingService

        public void onCreate()
        onCreate() - called when services is created. Prepares a wake lock so that the web server continues to listen for connection requests - lock is applied in the onStartCommand() function.
